statements: SELECT * FROM user_behavior_tracking;
SELECT user_id, action_type FROM user_behavior_tracking WHERE page_visited = 'homepage';
SELECT action_timestamp FROM user_behavior_tracking WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_tracking ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_behavior_tracking WHERE action_type = 'click';
SELECT user_id, action_timestamp, action_type, page_visited FROM user_behavior_tracking WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT action_type, page_visited, action_timestamp, user_id FROM user_behavior_tracking ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, action_type FROM user_behavior_tracking WHERE page_visited = 'home' AND action_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY action_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_tracking WHERE action_type IN ('login', 'signup') AND page_visited LIKE '%account%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT action_type FROM user_behavior_tracking WHERE page_visited IS NULL ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM UserBehavior;
SELECT behavior_type, user_id FROM UserBehavior ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT offer_description, offer_expiry_date FROM PersonalizedOffers WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PersonalizedOffers WHERE offer_expiry_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT behavior_type FROM UserBehavior WHERE behavior_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM UserBehavior WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PersonalizedOffers WHERE offer_expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM UserBehavior WHERE behavior_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM UserBehavior ORDER BY user_id ASC, behavior_type DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as behavior_count FROM UserBehavior GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, full_name, account_balance FROM user_profiles ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profiles WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT full_name, age FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT user_id, preferred_language FROM user_preferences WHERE customization_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY full_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT user_id, account_balance FROM user_profiles WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_balance ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, preferred_language FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_preference = 'Email'
SELECT * FROM user_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT offer_name, start_date, end_date FROM offers WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE last_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT u.first_name, t.transaction_type, t.amount FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id;
SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, up.language_preference FROM users u JOIN user_preferences up ON u.user_id = up.user_id WHERE up.language_preference = 'English';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT name, age FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE language = 'English';
SELECT user_id, pattern, result FROM behavior_analysis ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, name, age FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM user_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_type = 'Purchase' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, language, theme_color FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_preference = 'Email';
